SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="b286ebe89c9240f9b428f9b2bc38f7f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Aren't you the one who saved me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You are![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you SO much![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b286ebe89c9240f9b428f9b2bc38f7f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] have you ever thought it'd be fun to
try on a different look than your usual?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] really shake things up?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b286ebe89c9240f9b428f9b2bc38f7f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'll let you in on a little secret.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your friend
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] here is a stylist.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That means I can
help you update your look whenever.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_01a:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="f1397a45273b4cff8561dab37a084231" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You've got nothing to fear—[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is here![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f1397a45273b4cff8561dab37a084231" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Sooo...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I heard this rumor...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was told there
are these [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cuties running around with
leaves on their HEADS[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f1397a45273b4cff8561dab37a084231" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If that's true,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]I HAVE to meet one[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f1397a45273b4cff8561dab37a084231" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I think they could inspire me.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Inspire new
thoughts and new ideas.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's important to
experience new things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you think?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_01b:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="962696770ff546f8881aaac20efd8a8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You've got nothing to fear—[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is here![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="962696770ff546f8881aaac20efd8a8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had no idea that you'd [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]rescued
leaflings[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="962696770ff546f8881aaac20efd8a8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I'd[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] LOVE to meet more of them[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="962696770ff546f8881aaac20efd8a8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's important to be open to new
experiences.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Seeing new sights,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] meeting
new folks...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's inspiring,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you think?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_PreQuest_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="f601de7953364adfbe83595e1d198ab2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Anyone can change their style.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You and
only you get to decide what's YOU![etc:Wait frame="15"/] So
how about it?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Want to update your look?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="804d9135c8ac4dbabf071775df6a395b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Oh wow...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]your face.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I could swear you look
just like some other fantastic someone
around here.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_T02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="47e1a708be284a109fb753ce72e723b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hey, hey![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You are looking snip-snappy
today, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_S01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="98f3c4c91ad34d49977b01c12d8c3a31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I could swear you're the spitting image
of someone around here...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
maybe they're the spitting image of you!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_S02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="45cf7e8d5ba645d093985f6439614fa4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You feeling good about the look you've
got going?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's what I like to
hear![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You keep loving you for YOU,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="1ba17feff67d401ab25ef24858c5babe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Nothing would make me happier![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now, get
ready—I'm gonna show you how incredible
you are!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Continue_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="e4078f7b8f404153850ce09f1b0c2872" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Anything else I can do for you?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="0d2a4e6b7a4045b48ae6181ca435714e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You are glowing right now![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did you know
that?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I love it!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Outro_A02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="cb741b9f18cf47228072bf739605fbf4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Whether you're updating your look or not,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'm happy to see you anytime.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="6f2c790e45f247efb50ca40fb86701fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Aren't you charming?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes, yes, you are.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Charming in every single way!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="f7b9ef7e537842409a9de3f5a1dbcaa1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What's that, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] darling?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You want to
update your look too?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f7b9ef7e537842409a9de3f5a1dbcaa1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Ha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You have no need for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s help.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You are perfect exactly as you are!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="cc7e6b6d22b747f99e382042aa91ea7e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]Perhaps I'll look into adding dog grooming
to my repertoire...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]if we make it off this
planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that is.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="0d27ff66db074fc7b81863dd5e4dab73" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ooo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] yes! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]This is exactly what I've been
hoping for![etc:Wait frame="15"/] At last!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="46f9d89a8f7742beb230d552e69ffc76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I've come up with a brand-new look
inspired by those leaf cuties![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And it's
all thanks to you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="46f9d89a8f7742beb230d552e69ffc76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Care to give it a try?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You might like it![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Besides,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've got a good feeling the
"foliage look" is gonna be THE trend!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="8681986b23514072a5a53e0695440cb6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]You already rescued that many leaf
cuties?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Seriously?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8681986b23514072a5a53e0695440cb6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Your rescue skills are out of this world!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="f1679b2ce7174ad59e5fd10c546f148e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I've come up with a brand-new look
inspired by those leaf cuties![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And it's
all thanks to you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f1679b2ce7174ad59e5fd10c546f148e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Care to give it a try?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You might like it![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Besides,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've got a good feeling the
"foliage look" is gonna be THE trend!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="97d7843228714277b488d70faf618cc6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When your look shines,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] your whole YOU
shines too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So whaddaya say.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Want to
update your look?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="5d5fa4221985454fa7f84f37cc5ef97e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ready to update your look and try on a
whole new you?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="fa3601371aa647569fb353b69148e44a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Why did I become a stylist?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh, I can't tell
you that.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's like they say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "An air of
mystery is the sweetest perfume."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fa3601371aa647569fb353b69148e44a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]That's right.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You won't catch me wearing
my secrets like a gaudy pair of pants.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
It's not my style!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="8846dcb0ec1342c38b26e111dd9c4b64" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]With a little help from [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can
try on all sorts of beautiful body
shapes and sizes.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="3149218007d24430823e8eff8739a673" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There are so many lovelies in this world
who simply do not realize how incredible
they are.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And some even try to stifle it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3149218007d24430823e8eff8739a673" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]All your pal [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] does is help them
find their fabulous and put it on display
for all to see.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="d266d64d24414169ad5a1ecc1d550437" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you have a favorite color,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d266d64d24414169ad5a1ecc1d550437" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can touch up your color when
I update your look.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your space suit or your
spaceship can be whatever hue suits you!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="6c7dc715f75e4f3088f009f646e96929" Scale="0.9635417"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you ever feel like you need a name change,
I'm here to help.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When I update Your Look,
it's all part of the magic I work.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="b90d5a9916604103834302a608a9a6f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]So you want to know what planet your
friend [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is from, eh?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b90d5a9916604103834302a608a9a6f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Haha,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] THAT is a secret![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Being mysterious
is a fashion choice. So I don't reveal details
just like I don't wear socks with sandals.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="c878a6ff8c5746faba1060f7aecd129e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Being a rescuer sounds like hard work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
With all that responsibility on your
shoulders,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you get tense?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c878a6ff8c5746faba1060f7aecd129e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Make sure you take care of yourself,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And I mean take care of your body AND
mind.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Give yourself a break now and then![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c878a6ff8c5746faba1060f7aecd129e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If having [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] update your look helps
you relax,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just say the word.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's
nothing I'd love to do more.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="125be7d80e2c42c69f181d3ea1b6abd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Did you know that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s face massages
can change the shape of your face?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
They're also VERY relaxing.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="0303b6263f14469284ff6d67469b175e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You want me to tell you what's in style?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0303b6263f14469284ff6d67469b175e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Listen to me, lovely...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Trends change from
one planet to the next.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And what's "in
style" depends on who you ask.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0303b6263f14469284ff6d67469b175e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You spend too much time chasing after
trends,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you risk losing your way back to
YOU,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0303b6263f14469284ff6d67469b175e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A stylist's job is to find the fabulous inside
someone and bring it out into the sunshine.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Because THAT'S what real style is.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="b84096b4a46c4720a8e2def90c95dfbc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Why did I become a stylist?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh, I can't tell
you that.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's like they say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "An air of
mystery is the sweetest perfume."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b84096b4a46c4720a8e2def90c95dfbc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]That's right.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You won't catch me wearing
my secrets like a gaudy pair of pants.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
It's not my style!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="630e9e64804547b08f0702faf6447417" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]With a little help from [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can
try on all sorts of beautiful body
shapes and sizes.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="6a46e724a4aa4ffe8c094541a7b93bba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There are so many lovelies in this world
who simply do not realize how incredible
they are.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And some even try to stifle it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6a46e724a4aa4ffe8c094541a7b93bba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]All your pal [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] does is help them
find their fabulous and put it on display
for all to see.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="5a31cfd39919484aa0f845d1333911af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I was on my way to visit a client of mine
when my spaceship practically fell apart
and then crashed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5a31cfd39919484aa0f845d1333911af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I was so worried![etc:Wait frame="8"/] But then you came
along and rescued me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5a31cfd39919484aa0f845d1333911af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh dear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what am I going to do?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your
poor friend [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has so many clients
waiting for him![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5a31cfd39919484aa0f845d1333911af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no sense worrying over untrimmed
hair.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll simply explain what happened and
apologize once I'm off this planet!
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="3fd3d685a979423faa89ed2d62ba65b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Anyone can change their style.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You and
only you get to decide what's YOU![etc:Wait frame="15"/] So
how about it?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Want to update your look?
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="aaa0d65b04814794bf52835666842b6b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Watching the leaf cuties is so inspiring![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I feel like I might come up with a new
design any moment now...
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="b46f23c38de6425cb68e4c447b54517f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Being a rescuer sounds like hard work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
With all that responsibility on your
shoulders,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you get tense?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b46f23c38de6425cb68e4c447b54517f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Make sure you take care of yourself,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And I mean take care of your body AND
mind.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Give yourself a break now and then![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b46f23c38de6425cb68e4c447b54517f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If having [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] update your look helps
you relax,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just say the word.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's
nothing I'd love to do more.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="c20046becfb5481781dd97868a213861" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Did you know that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal11"/]Puddle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s face massages
can change the shape of your face?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
They're also VERY relaxing.
SV010.SV010_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="cfa8aa23b3644deeae4cd21c7eae9a8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You want me to tell you what's in style?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cfa8aa23b3644deeae4cd21c7eae9a8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Listen to me, lovely...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Trends change from
one planet to the next.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And what's "in
style" depends on who you ask.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cfa8aa23b3644deeae4cd21c7eae9a8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You spend too much time chasing after
trends,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you risk losing your way back to
YOU,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cfa8aa23b3644deeae4cd21c7eae9a8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A stylist's job is to find the fabulous inside
someone and bring it out into the sunshine.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Because THAT'S what real style is.
